description:
These errors started happening on Nov. 22:

2013-11-26 17:24:23.450 ERROR nova.openstack.common.rpc.common [req-dd4fae17-757e-4f0b-b961-a3bff09436de ServerPersonalityTestXML-tempest-1197344980-user ServerPersonalityTestXML-tempest-1197344980-tenant] Returning exception unexpected task state: expecting (u'spawning',) but the actual state is deleting to caller
title: Unexpeceted task state ERRORs in n-cond after successful tempest run

comments.content:
These errors started happening on Nov. 22:

2013-11-26 17:24:23.450 ERROR nova.openstack.common.rpc.common [req-dd4fae17-757e-4f0b-b961-a3bff09436de ServerPersonalityTestXML-tempest-1197344980-user ServerPersonalityTestXML-tempest-1197344980-tenant] Returning exception unexpected task state: expecting (u'spawning',) but the actual state is deleting to caller
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content:
Not seeing this anymore, so if you are still seeing it please re-open with a link to the logs with the failure so we can fingerprint it in logstash.

http://logstash.openstack.org/#
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
